channel.title: Homes on Nvim presentation
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Nvim presentation

item.title: Tech Talk: NVIM as code editor
item.description: Origins of NVIM According to github(where is the codebase of nvim), the first commit of this editor comes on january 31 by a Brasilian named Thiago Padilha Motivations behind development Frustration with limitations of existing editors. Desire for a more extensible and community-driven approach. Recognition of the importance of collaboration and open-source principles.

item.title: Tech Talk: NVIM as code editor
item.description: So, why I choose NVIM over other editors? Let’s explore its key advantages Efficiency in performance Modular and extensible architecture Great community support Used to use vim Really nice customization Feel fulfilled with an accomplished setup ðŸ˜‚
